text: Taken 2 is a 2012 English-language French action thriller movie. It was directed by Olivier Megaton and produced by Luc Besson. It is set in Istanbul. It stars Liam Neeson, Maggie Grace, Famke Janssen, Leland Orser, Jon Gries, D.B. Sweeney, Luke Grimes, and Rade Šerbedžija. It is the sequel to the 2008 movie Taken and was released on 3 October 2012. Another sequel, Taken 3, was released in 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * * Taken 2 at The Numbers Category:2010s action thriller movies Category:2012 crime thriller movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2010s chase movies Category:French action movies Category:French crime movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Movies set in Istanbul Category:Kidnapping in fiction Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about families Category:Movies about revenge Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Albanian-language movies
title: Taken 2
